value.string: ## Bot to download remittance and extract amount (if matched template) ##
-- RUN details - invoice, amount, address extraction bot here --
Company sub file not exist, Can't download remittance, Log error here
-- BOT END , till searching and downloading remittance --
Please enter the conditional commands here.
Please enter your commands to loop.

value.expression:
If File Exists ("$@AAApplicationPath$\Automation Anywhere\My Docs\Valvoline_WP\Company_Data\$vCompanyCode$\$System:Day.Number:toString$-$System:Month.Number:toString$-$System:Year.Number:toString$\Bank_Statement\$Amount-Txt-Name$")  Then   
Select File : $@AAApplicationPath$\Automation Anywhere\My Docs\Valvoline_WP\Company_Data\$vCompanyCode$\$System:Day.Number:toString$-$System:Month.Number:toString$-$System:Year.Number:toString$\Bank_Statement\$Amount-Txt-Name$
